reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the application collects Information You Provide as well as Automatically Collected Information. It mentions the specific types of data collected and how they are used.
reply.reference: This privacy policy governs your use of the software application Mind Body Trivia ('Application') for mobile devices. By using the Application, you consent to the collection of information by us and third parties that may collect information used to identify you. Information You Provide. The Application obtains the information you provide when you download and register the Application. Registration with us is optional... Automatically Collected Information. In addition, the Application may collect certain information automatically... How We Use Information. We use this information to provide... URL: https://mindbodytrivia.com/privacy

Privacy Policy
This privacy policy governs your use of the software application Mind Body Trivia ("Application") for mobile devices. By using the Application, you consent to the collection of information by us and third parties that may collect information used to identify you.
Information You Provide

or via the mobile application marketplace or network.
Children
We do not use the Application to knowingly solicit data from or market to children under the age of 13. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects a variety of data types including name/nickname, third party service ID, email address, phone number, address, profile photo, age range, gender, interests, information from polls, purchase information, IP address, unique device identifiers, advertising identifiers, mobile operating system, mobile carrier, mobile Internet browser type, approximate location, and details on app usage.

content: Approximate location inferred from IP address
Information about the way the App is used

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly lists the types of data that the app may collect from users, both provided by the users themselves and automatically collected.
reply.reference: The app collects a variety of data types including name/nickname, third party service ID, email address, phone number, address, profile photo, age range, gender, interests, information from polls, purchase information, IP address, unique device identifiers, advertising identifiers, mobile operating system, mobile carrier, mobile Internet browser type, approximate location, and details on app usage. URL: https://mindbodytrivia.com/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use as mentioned in the privacy policy document.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the purposes of data collection and use, ranging from providing and improving the application to personalization and security.
reply.reference: We use this information to provide, maintain, secure, customize and improve our Application. We may use the information we collect for a number of business and commercial purposes... Understand how you interact with our Application and personalize the experience and content... Maintain the security of our Application by authenticating users and providing account security and fraud detection... URL: https://mindbodytrivia.com/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection by easily uninstalling the Application.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can stop all collection of information by uninstalling the Application.
reply.reference: You can stop all collection of information by the Application easily by uninstalling the Application. URL: https://mindbodytrivia.com/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may share User Provided and Automatically Collected Information with third parties.
reply.reference: We will share your information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy statement. URL: https://mindbodytrivia.com/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with trusted services providers who work on their behalf.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app will share information with trusted services providers who work on their behalf, ensuring they adhere to the rules set forth in the privacy statement.
reply.reference: with our trusted services providers who work on our behalf, do not have an independent use of the information we disclose to them, and have agreed to adhere to the rules set forth in this privacy statement. URL: https://mindbodytrivia.com/privacy
